properties.name: ebookstore.bootstrap.default-admin-user.username
properties.description: Default username of admin user that is bootstrapped on database initialization or if missing.

properties.name: ebookstore.bootstrap.default-admin-user.password
properties.description: Default password of admin user that is bootstrapped on database initialization or if missing.

properties.name: ebookstore.bootstrap.default-admin-user.first-name
properties.description: Default first name of admin user that is bootstrapped on database initialization or if missing.

properties.name: ebookstore.bootstrap.default-admin-user.last-name
properties.description: Default last name of admin user that is bootstrapped on database initialization or if missing.
